Erode , as the headquarters of Erode district , has an extensive highway and road network .
The Tamil Nadu State Road Transport Corporation operates huge fleet of buses from Erode to almost all places of the state and to neighboring states like Kerala , Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh .
There are lot of trains available from all parts of Tamil Nadu .
Catch Cheran , Nilgiri , Kovai , Yercaud , Allepey and all Kerala-bound trains from Chennai Central .

Known for its name " Textile City " - Erode is famous for its Textile market where you can purchase textile products ( Bedspreads , shirting and suiting ... ) for very low prices .
Textile merchants from various parts of India converge here for Textile trading , especially in cotton materials .
Erode is also famous for Turmeric ( Manjal ) which is a natural anti-septic powder .
